card.name: Foraging Jackalope
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {3}{G}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Moxtober 2025 Prompts 1-20 X25
card.text: 1. Rabbit 2. Meditation 3. Wish 4. Quartet 5. Moon 6. Prism 7. Power 8. Punish 9. Compact 10. Constellation 11. Transformation 12. Sequence 13. Pretty 14. Soldier 15. Sailor 16. Scout 17. Grail 18. Crystal 19. Eternal 20. Guardian

card.name: Moxtober 2025 Prompts 21-31 X25
card.text: 21. Silver 22. Millennium 23. Tuxedo 24. Mask 25. Cosmos 26. Seed 27. Moonlight 28. Daylight 29. Princess 30. Serenity 31. Infinity

card.name: Ulderwild Communion
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, scry 1, then put a soul counter on this enchantment. {4}{G}{G}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Create an X/X green Spirit creature token with trample, where X is the number of soul counters on this enchantment.

card.name: Ronwena, Ancient Herald
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice two creatures. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player sacrifices two creatures.) At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures died under your control this turn, you may put a card you own from outside the game into your hand.

card.name: Rafter Sprites
card.text: Flying Whenever another creature you control with flying enters, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying and "This token can block only creatures with flying." This ability triggers only once each turn.
